overview: Tommy Lima and Manuel Lozano are so hot together. And they're even hotter when they're dreaming about sex with other guys. Spanish Playhouse #2 finds the two lying in bed together just after finishing a fuck fest in Spanish Playhouse #1. The dreams are sweet and the cum sweeter as the two dare to dream in this hot sequel shot in Puerta De Los Suenos in Barcelona, Spain.
title: Spanish Playhouse 2
